column4: i really need quick help. I have an external harddrive with folders i need to accesss on it. next to there folders there is an envolope looking thing. when i try to open them i recieve "You do not have the permissions necessary to view the contents of _______"

i really need quick help. I have an external harddrive with folders i need to accesss on it. next to there folders there is an envolope looking thing. when i try to open them i recieve "You do not have the permissions necessary to view the contents of _______"   can anyone help me?
did you want me to help ya out?
then please don't repeat your question.
so have you mounted the drive?
let me research a bit for you
so, you type it in terminal, and then it went to the next line?
and if that didn't work, try: sudo chmod -R 777 /media/disk-1
the system you're trying to get on, why not just boot to it?
